mapper.select: SELECT s.STABLE_ID AS sampleId, sv.SITE1_ENTREZ_GENE_ID AS site1EntrezGeneId, g1.HUGO_GENE_SYMBOL AS site1HugoSymbol, sv.SITE1_ENSEMBL_TRANSCRIPT_ID AS site1EnsemblTranscriptId, sv.SITE1_CHROMOSOME AS site1Chromosome, sv.SITE1_REGION AS site1Region, sv.SITE1_REGION_NUMBER AS site1RegionNumber, sv.SITE1_CONTIG AS site1Contig, sv.SITE1_POSITION AS site1Position, sv.SITE1_DESCRIPTION AS site1Description, sv.SITE2_ENTREZ_GENE_ID AS site2EntrezGeneId, g2.HUGO_GENE_SYMBOL AS site2HugoSymbol, sv.SITE2_ENSEMBL_TRANSCRIPT_ID AS site2EnsemblTranscriptId, sv.SITE2_CHROMOSOME AS site2Chromosome, sv.SITE2_REGION AS site2Region, sv.SITE2_REGION_NUMBER AS site2RegionNumber, sv.SITE2_CONTIG AS site2Contig, sv.SITE2_POSITION AS site2Position, sv.SITE2_DESCRIPTION AS site2Description, sv.SITE2_EFFECT_ON_FRAME AS site2EffectOnFrame, sv.NCBI_BUILD AS ncbiBuild, sv.DNA_SUPPORT AS dnaSupport, sv.RNA_SUPPORT AS rnaSupport, sv.NORMAL_READ_COUNT AS normalReadCount, sv.TUMOR_READ_COUNT AS tumorReadCount, sv.NORMAL_VARIANT_COUNT AS normalVariantCount, sv.TUMOR_VARIANT_COUNT AS tumorVariantCount, sv.NORMAL_PAIRED_END_READ_COUNT AS normalPairedEndReadCount, sv.TUMOR_PAIRED_END_READ_COUNT AS tumorPairedEndReadCount, sv.NORMAL_SPLIT_READ_COUNT AS normalSplitReadCount, sv.TUMOR_SPLIT_READ_COUNT AS tumorSplitReadCount, sv.ANNOTATION AS annotation, sv.BREAKPOINT_TYPE AS breakpointType, sv.CONNECTION_TYPE AS connectionType, sv.EVENT_INFO AS eventInfo, sv.CLASS AS structuralVariantClass, sv.LENGTH AS length, sv.COMMENTS AS comments, sv.SV_STATUS AS svStatus FROM structural_variant sv JOIN genetic_profile gp ON gp.genetic_profile_id = sv.genetic_profile_id JOIN sample s ON s.internal_id = sv.sample_id LEFT JOIN gene g1 ON g1.entrez_gene_id = sv.site1_entrez_gene_id LEFT JOIN gene g2 ON g2.entrez_gene_id = sv.site2_entrez_gene_id WHERE gp.stable_id = #{molecularProfileStableId}
